column2: B&B Duplex appartment in old mansion
column3: amazing apartment with very lovely hosts. cosy rooms and the pool in the garden was perfect for the hot days. Breakfast was served in the garden and city centre is 3min walking distance

column2: B&B Duplex appartment in old mansion
column3: We did like the excellent hospitality and the facilities, in particular the sauna. We also had a great breakfast in the garden. As a bonus there were two cute cats, including an "old lady" of 17 years .

column2: B&B Duplex appartment in old mansion
column3: Friendly greeting. properties facilities . and great location .

column2: B&B Duplex appartment in old mansion
column4: Perhaps misses an oven but not very important.

column2: B&B Duplex appartment in old mansion
column3: Nice room and bathroom, excellent extra's like sauna and swimming pool. Very good breakfast. Very good location close to city centre, walking distance. Friendly owners

column2: B&B Duplex appartment in old mansion
column3: Very helpful and friendly hosts. Delicious breakfast! Close to city center.

column2: B&B Duplex appartment in old mansion
column3: We thought about keeping this a secret, since we definitely want to come back, but we felt we owe it to the great hosts: This place is simply amazing! The rooms, the breakfast, the pool, the location..everything!
